CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Solar cells using PffBB-n as a donor material and PC71BM as the acceptor material were fabricated with an inverted device structure of ITO / ZnO / PffBB-n:PC71BM(1 : 2 w / w ) / MoO 3 / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. The first material name to identify is "PffBB-n." It is mentioned as a donor material in the solar cells.
2. The second material name is "PC71BM." It is mentioned as the acceptor material in the solar cells.
3. The third material name is "ZnO." It is mentioned as a layer in the device structure of the solar cells.
4. The fourth material name is "MoO3." It is mentioned as a layer in the device structure of the solar cells.
5. The fifth and final material name is "Al." It is mentioned as a layer in the device structure of the solar cells.

Therefore, the material names in the paragraph are: PffBB-n, PC71BM, ZnO, MoO3, and Al.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PffBB-n
2. PC71BM
3. ZnO
4. MoO3
5. Al

I have removed the irrelevant entities and only kept the entities that clearly refer to Material Names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |
| ZnO |
| MoO3 |
| Al |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Solar cells using PffBB-n as a donor material and PC71BM as the acceptor material were fabricated with an inverted device structure of ITO / ZnO / PffBB-n:PC71BM(1 : 2 w / w ) / MoO 3 / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. ZnO: Zinc Oxide
3. PffBB-n: This appears to be a specific type of donor material, but without further context, I cannot provide a specific name or description.
4. PC71BM: This appears to be a specific type of acceptor material, but without further context, I cannot provide a specific name or description.
5. (1 : 2 w / w): This likely refers to the weight ratio of the donor and acceptor materials (PffBB-n and PC71BM) in the solar cell.
6. MoO3: Molybdenum(VI) Oxide
7. Al: Aluminum

These are the "Property Name" entities that I can identify in the given paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide (Material Property: Conductivity)
2. ZnO: Zinc Oxide (Material Property: Semiconductivity)
3. PffBB-n: Donor material (Material Property: Type of semiconductor, Energy levels, etc.)
4. PC71BM: Acceptor material (Material Property: Type of semiconductor, Energy levels, etc.)
5. MoO3: Molybdenum(VI) Oxide (Material Property: Conductivity)
6. Al: Aluminum (Material Property: Conductivity)

Note: The (1 : 2 w / w) weight ratio is not a material property, but a formulation ratio.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| ZnO |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |
| (1 : 2 w / w) |
| MoO3 |
| Al |
